nodes.text: The Hugo was a BFF-1 bulk freighter used by Overlord Ghorin to be part of a convoy to deliver grain to the Imperials. Unfortunately the freighter, along with the Grotius, were disabled along with the rest of the convoy by Rebel Y-wings. They were then boarded by Rebel freighters intending to swap grain cargos in order to discredit Ghorin as a traitor.
